attributes.action: change the name of the House of Commons to "Den of Thieves".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The names of the two chambers reflect their respective compositions: the House of Lords for peers and the House of Commons for non peers. I propose that the name of the lower chamber be updated to reflect its modern composition more accurately. As it would appear a substantial number of MPs are robbing us blind I feel "Den of Thieves" would be far more appropriate.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
